## Installation

You can install the development version of **northstar** from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("andrewallenbruce/northstar")
```

## Example: Payment Amount Calculation

```{r example, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(northstar)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
rvu() |> 
  filter(status   == "A",
         work.rvu == max(work.rvu, na.rm = TRUE)) |> 
  select(hcpcs, 
         description,
         work.rvu, 
         pe.rvu_nonfac, 
         pe.rvu_fac, 
         mp.rvu, 
         cf) |>
  glimpse()
```

```{r}
gpci() |> 
  filter(state    == "GA", 
         locality == "01") |>
  glimpse()
```

```{r}
calc_amounts(wrvu  = 108.91,
             prvu  = 35.14,
             mrvu  = 26.95,
             wgpci = 1.0,
             pgpci = 0.997,
             mgpci = 1.128,
             cf    = 32.7442)
```

```{r}
payment() |> 
  filter(hcpcs      == "39503", 
         carrier_no == "10212",
         locality   == "01") |> 
  select(hcpcs,
         mac = carrier_no,
         locality,
         fee_nonfac,
         fee_fac) |> 
  glimpse()
```
